skills.name: SPITEFUL STRIKE
desc: • Deals 3 hits of magic damage to a single target.
• 40% Chance to apply Thorn Shield to each ally for 3 turns.
• Remove Immunity with a 25% Chance to Remove Perfect Immunity.
• 50% Chance to Steal 1 Power from the enemy.

skills.name: RIGHT THE WRONGS
desc: • Deal 100% of a random enemy’s MAX HP as magic damage to that enemy and Heal all allies for the same percentage of their MAX HP.
• Increase Beneficial Effect Duration on all allies by 2.
• Grant Perfect Immunity to all allies for 2 turns.
• Grant Increased Fury Generation to all allies and Inflict Decreased Fury Generation to all enemies for 2 turns.

skills.name: CORNUCOPIA OF REGRET
desc: • At the start of battle apply a Perfect Heal shield for the duration of battle.
• Block incoming damage for allies below 50% HP and take 5% of your MAX HP as random damage for each hit blocked.
• Decrease the duration of beneficial effects on all enemies by 2 turns for each ally that has Ghost or Soul Protect active at the start of your turn..
